DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to investigate whether there is a link between clinical and biological variables and bioassay high xaban in elderly patients as part of an unscheduled hospitalization.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Clinical and Laboratory Variables Associated With a Direct Oral Anticoagulant Bioassay Higher Among Those Aged Over 75 Years
